articles.title: F&B licences of 3 former nightlife venues revoked over COVID-19 breaches
articles.description:
SINGAPORE: Three food and beverage (F&B) outlets that were formerly nightlife operators have had their licences to serve food revoked for breaching COVID-19 safe management measures.

articles.author: Adam Miller,Lauren Pelley
articles.title: Canada could avoid the worst of a 4th wave — but we're not out of the woods yet
articles.description: Canada will likely face a fourth wave of the pandemic as the highly contagious delta variant continues to spread ahead of borders and schools reopening, but there’s growing optimism another surge won’t bring the country back to a crisis point.

articles.author: Jacqueline (Jacquie) Gahagan (they/them), Full Professor, Faculty of Health, Dalhousie University
articles.title: The difference between sex and gender, and why both matter in health research
articles.description: Sex is not gender but research continues to treat these as the same concept, with potentially damaging consequences for health studies, health policies and health programs.
articles.content:
Both sex and gender analysis are crucial to health research to enable access to appropriate health information, diagnoses and care for gender-diverse populations. (Shutterstock)
